Sergei Prokofiev

Three Pieces, op. 96

1941–1942

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 11' 30"

  • 1. Waltz
  • 2. Contredanse
  • 3. Mephisto Waltz

1. Waltz

This is an arrangement of a piece from the opera War and Peace (op. 91). Prokofiev also used a version in his orchestral Waltz Suite (op. 110).

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 3.5

2. Contredanse

This is an arrangement of a piece from the music to the film Lermontov.

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 4

3. Mephisto Waltz

This is an arrangement of a piece from the music to the film Lermontov. Prokofiev also used a version in his orchestral Waltz Suite (op. 110).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5
